cause.description:
Our goal is to think.
Our hope is that in meeting our goal, we will also improve the world.
1. Your Opinion Doesn't Matter
2. The Crowd is Not Always Right
3. Knowledge is Discovered Not Created
4. Think about the causes of your actions
5. Think and Do, In that Order.
cause.mission: Inspire people to think, not to simply borrow ideas without contemplation
cause.name: Think: Save the World From Stupid People
